body: wish there was a continuation to this manga with the same characters I was hoping to see more of her similar to how a certain other main character got multiple short manga dedicated to her and her..well struggles. This one in particular I keep finding myself back to everything was done just right for me between the showing the panty shots inside her cloths to show what is going on and to give views to the perfect angles of seeing her butt inside her panties especially during the part where she can't hold it anymore and each panel shows her poop gradually come out while she is just standing there to her expressions of being hopeless as she knows she can't hold it anymore everything was just done so right in this one. this will remain one of my top favorites wish there were more stories like this one from this same artist. his illustrations are very well done for the scat and really good with get some nice looking butts of his various characters and their holes too ;)

Another similar manga about...holding it in
Title: Chanto Toilet de Shimashou
